channel.title: [UPDATE!] Project: Kingdom Hearts 3: Birth By Sleep [UPDATE!]
channel.description:
Tribbinator dibbed: Roxas' Keyblade [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/N8Jiccra-3.png[/img]
Ven's Keyblade: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/380456-ven_s_keyblade_super-3.jpg[/img]
SilentCJ dibbed: Aqua's Keyblade: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/Aquas_Keyblade-3.jpg[/img]
Terra's Keyblade: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/Terras_Keyblade-4.jpg[/img] [Tell me if you want to "dibb" something so I can put a pic of it, and your name in the title.
shrogg dibbed: Ven: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/321px-Ven_armor.png[/img]
dylan dibbed: Terra: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/259px-Terra_armor.png[/img]
Aqua: [IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/Aqua_armor.png[/img]
Okay, so I had this wonderful idea. If you have ever seen the trailer or the movie after beating KH2, you will know about these guys.
They are these 3 people in this wicked as hell armor with these kick-arse keyblades.
It would be amazing to make these into NPC's, animate them, and put them in the game.
And of course when you kill these guys, you could get your own pieces of their armor, or if you get lucky, even get the keyblade.
[UPDATE] Anybody can help, when you finish the model just send me the links and I will post them in the New Thread. Thank you for your help.
Also send me all pictures of the threee people and their weapons from the videos and I will post them here.
And of course I would not be able to do this by myself, so any good modelers interested in helping?
Helpers: cocoa shrogg SilentCJ Tribbinator
People I hope to help out: Frell And Dylan
The reason I would like you few to help out, is well. Because.. You're just purely awesome :D

item.source: [UPDATE!] Project: Kingdom Hearts 3: Birth By Sleep [UPDATE!]

item.title: [UPDATE!] Project: Kingdom Hearts 3: Birth By Sleep [UPDATE!]
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:56, topic:332469”]I’m not a complete penis.
I always worked out whether it would fit in a client by going to reduce polygons in metasequoia. Whether they was quads or triangles or not doesn’t matter, because I just tried it, and after triangulating, it still read the same value from the reduce polygons dialog. If that number was below 1500 then it would fit, anymore then it wouldn’t, that’s how I did it.[/quote]No, when you tessellate the total faces double.

Read full topic
item.source: [UPDATE!] Project: Kingdom Hearts 3: Birth By Sleep [UPDATE!]

If that number was below 1500 then it would fit, anymore then it wouldn’t, that’s how I did it.[/quote]
Huh? whats this bout you being a penis now? I’m confused.

I always worked out whether it would fit in a client by going to reduce polygons in metasequoia. Whether they was quads or triangles or not doesn’t matter, because I just tried it, and after triangulating, it still read the same value from the reduce polygons dialog. If that number was below 1500 then it would fit, anymore then it wouldn’t, that’s how I did it.
